title: FS Vic Willis / Johnny Evers - Sold
author: autos4alex

posts.post_title: FS Vic Willis / Johnny Evers - Sold
posts.post_content:
I'm raising money for my kids college.  Payment is through donations to my kids 529 account - it is like using a check online.  Glad to provide references.

Shipping is included for US buyers.

My intention is to offer 10% discount from VCP, it's tough to calculate sometimes depending on how recent sales are.  Glad to discuss if you think I got it wrong, otherwise not fielding offers at this time.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=445734&d=1615521940[/IMG]

Johnny Evers Sweet Caporal SGC 40 - $300
Comparable Sales in 2020/2021:
PSA 3   - 3/10/21$380.00
PSA 3   - 12/22/20$449.95
SGC 40 - 10/4/20$240.75
PSA 3   -  7/2/20$324.99
PSA 3   - 3/29/20$226.00
PSA 3   - 3/11/20$212.50

Vic Willis Piedmont SGC 40 - $170
Comparable Sales in 2020/2021:
PSA 3 - 1/12/21$177.50
PSA 3 - 7/15/20$195.00
PSA 3 - 7/5/20$225.00

I’ll take the Evers!  I’ll pm to get payment info.


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
I’ll take Willis if no one grabbed it yet.
